001package com.commercetools.graphql.api.client;
002
003import com.commercetools.graphql.api.types.CustomerSignMeInDraft;
004import com.netflix.graphql.dgs.client.codegen.GraphQLQuery;
005import java.lang.Override;
006import java.lang.String;
007import java.util.HashSet;
008import java.util.Set;
009
010/**
011 * BETA: This feature can be subject to change and should be used carefully in production. https://docs.commercetools.com/api/contract#public-beta
012 *
013 * Retrieves the authenticated customer (a customer that matches the given email/password pair).
014 *
015 * If used with an access token for Anonymous Sessions, all orders and carts belonging to the `anonymousId` will be assigned to the newly created customer.
016 *
017 * * If the customer does not have a cart yet, the anonymous cart that was modified most recently becomes the customer's cart.
018 * * If the customer already has a cart, the most recently modified anonymous cart will be handled according to the `AnonymousCartSignInMode`.
019 *
020 * If a cart is is returned as part of the `CustomerSignInResult`, it has been recalculated (it will have up-to-date prices, taxes and discounts, and invalid line items have been removed).
021 */
022public class CustomerSignMeInGraphQLQuery extends GraphQLQuery {
023  public CustomerSignMeInGraphQLQuery(CustomerSignMeInDraft draft, String storeKey,
024      String queryName, Set<String> fieldsSet) {
025    super("mutation", queryName);
026    if (draft != null || fieldsSet.contains("draft")) {
027        getInput().put("draft", draft);
028    }if (storeKey != null || fieldsSet.contains("storeKey")) {
029        getInput().put("storeKey", storeKey);
030    }
031  }
032
033  public CustomerSignMeInGraphQLQuery() {
034    super("mutation");
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  public String getOperationName() {
039     return "customerSignMeIn";
040                    
041  }
042
043  public static Builder newRequest() {
044    return new Builder();
045  }
046
047  public static class Builder {
048    private Set<String> fieldsSet = new HashSet<>();
049
050    private CustomerSignMeInDraft draft;
051
052    private String storeKey;
053
054    private String queryName;
055
056    public CustomerSignMeInGraphQLQuery build() {
057      return new CustomerSignMeInGraphQLQuery(draft, storeKey, queryName, fieldsSet);
058               
059    }
060
061    public Builder draft(CustomerSignMeInDraft draft) {
062      this.draft = draft;
063      this.fieldsSet.add("draft");
064      return this;
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * The mutation is only performed if the resource is part of the store. Can be used with store-specific OAuth permissions.
069     */
070    public Builder storeKey(String storeKey) {
071      this.storeKey = storeKey;
072      this.fieldsSet.add("storeKey");
073      return this;
074    }
075
076    public Builder queryName(String queryName) {
077      this.queryName = queryName;
078      return this;
079    }
080  }
081}
